instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..
definitions.820-3662: What is 820-3662? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.U7100: What is U7100? U7100 refers to the ISL6259 or ISL9239 charging IC on Macbooks from 2013 to the present.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2014) - boots only if the battery is disconnected
threads.message:
The only visible damage on the MLB was near the TPS. 
Fixed it, but the device doesn't boot when the battery is connected. Once you disconnect the battery, it works fine.
Also, tested with a new battery, no go.

No idea where to start from, please help me.
[ATTACH type="full" align="left" width="345px"]60040[/ATTACH]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2014) - boots only if the battery is disconnected
threads.message:
Check if starts in SMC bypass mode.

Post exact <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> voltage w/ and w/o battery connected.
Be sure <TRANSISTOR>Q7130</TRANSISTOR> is not shorted.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2014) - boots only if the battery is disconnected
threads.message: I don't know if it is silly to ask, but how perform SMC bypass?

threads.message:
Same issue on my <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> voltage w/o battery 12.60v

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> voltage w/o adpter
 11.90v(showing battery voltage)

<TRANSISTOR>Q7130</TRANSISTOR> is not shorted.
And i already changed <CHIP>U7100</CHIP>, bios
